column4: Using the latest ubuntu iso, i am trying to boot it on my laptop but when it comes to mounting root filesystems the splash screen disappears and all i see is black screen with "Uncompressing Linux... Ok, booting the kernel".. and nothing happens
try using the safe graphics install option
